TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ASCIIEncoding extends System.Text.Encoding

summary.span: 代表 Unicode 字元的 ASCII 字元編碼方式。

span.span: Represents an ASCII character encoding of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將一組 Unicode 字元轉換成位元組序列的處理程序。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是將編碼的位元組序列轉換成一組 Unicode 字元的程序。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. 對應至 Windows 字碼頁 20127。 corresponds to the Windows code page 20127. 由於 ASCII 是 7 位元編碼方式，僅限於從 U + 0000 到 U + 007F 最低的 128 個 Unicode 字元，ASCII 字元。Because ASCII is a 7-bit encoding, ASCII characters are limited to the lowest 128 Unicode characters, from U+0000 to U+007F. 如果您使用所傳回的預設編碼器屬性或編碼作業執行之前，將會取代以問號 （？） 的建構函式，該範圍以外的字元。If you use the default encoder returned by the property or the constructor, characters outside that range are replaced with a question mark (?) before the encoding operation is performed. 因為類別僅支援有限的字元組， ， ，和類別是比較適合全球化應用程式。Because the class supports only a limited character set, the , , and classes are better suited for globalized applications. 下列考量可協助您決定是否要使用:The following considerations can help you to decide whether to use : - 某些通訊協定需要 ASCII 或 ASCII 的子集。Some protocols require ASCII or a subset of ASCII. 在這些情況下 ASCII 編碼是適當的。In these cases ASCII encoding is appropriate. - 如果預期的 8 位元編碼方式，然後 ASCII 可能不正確的選擇。If an 8-bit encoding is expected, then ASCII probably isn't the correct choice. 相反地，請考慮使用 UTF8 而不 ASCII。Instead, consider using UTF8 instead of ASCII. 字元 U + 0000 到 U + 007F，結果會相同，但所有的 Unicode 字元都可以顯示 utf-8，以避免資料遺失。For the characters U+0000 through U+007F, the results are identical, but all Unicode characters are representable in UTF-8, which avoids data loss. > [!CAUTION] > 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 基於安全性理由，您應該使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, you should use , , or and enable error detection. 方法會判斷多少個位元組會導致一組 Unicode 字元編碼和方法會執行實際的編碼方式。The method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the method performs the actual encoding. 同樣地，方法會判斷多少個字元產生的位元組序列解碼和和方法會執行實際的解碼。Likewise, the method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the and methods perform the actual decoding. 請注意，預設值建構函式本身可能沒有適當的行為，您的應用程式。Note that the default constructor by itself might not have the appropriate behavior for your application. 您可能要考慮設定或屬性或以防止具有 8 位元組的序列。You might want to consider setting the or property to or to prevent sequences with the 8th bit set. 自訂行為也可能適用於這種情況。Custom behavior might also be appropriate for these cases. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何編碼的 Unicode 字元到 ASCII。The following example demonstrates how to encode Unicode characters into ASCII. 請注意，使用您的應用程式就會發生資料遺失來編碼 Unicode 字元的 ASCII 範圍之外。Notice the loss of data that occurs when your application uses to encode Unicode characters outside of the ASCII range. [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example/CPP/snippet.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example/CS/snippet.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding Example/VB/snippet.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: ASCIIEncoding();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 類別並未提供錯誤偵測。The class does not provide error detection. 基於安全性理由，您應該使用， ，或類別，並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, you should use the , , or class and enable error detection. 如果您選擇使用 ASCII 編碼方式，這個建構函式可能不會提供您的應用程式的適當後援行為。If you choose to use ASCII encoding, this constructor may not provide the appropriate fallback behavior for your application. 它會使用和以問號 （？） 取代每個字元 U + 0000 到 U + 007F 範圍外的類別。It uses the and classes to replace every character outside the range of U+0000 through U+007F with a question mark (?). 相反地，您可以呼叫或方法並將它傳遞和物件使用例外狀況後援。Instead, you can call the or method and pass it and objects to use exception fallback. > [!NOTE] > 只支援 Unicode 字元值介於 U + 0000 與 U + 007F。 supports only the Unicode character values between U+0000 and U+007F. 因此， ， ，和較適合全球化應用程式。Therefore, , , and are better suited for globalized applications. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立新執行個體，並顯示名稱的編碼方式。The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance and display the name of the encoding. [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example/CPP/ctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example/CS/ctor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ctor Example/VB/ctor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 計算將一組字元編碼所產生的位元組數目。

span.span: Calculates the number of bytes produced by encoding a set of characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法以傳回編碼字串，使用所需的位元組數目。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to return the number of bytes required to encode a string using . [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetByteCount2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetByteCount2 Example/CPP/getbytecount-string.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetByteCount2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetByteCount2 Example/CS/getbytecount-string.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetByteCount2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetByteCount2 Example/VB/getbytecount-string.vb#1)]

param.name: chars
param.span: 要編碼的第一個字元指標。

span.span: A pointer to the first character to encode.

param.name: charCount
param.span: 要編碼的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters to encode.

param.name: bytes
param.span: 開始寫入結果位元組序列的位置指標。

summary.span: 將起始於指定字元指標的一組字元編碼成位元組序列；儲存該位元組序列時，係以指定的位元組指標為起始點。

span.span: Encodes a set of characters starting at the specified character pointer into a sequence of bytes that are stored starting at the specified byte pointer.

returns.span: 在 所表示的位置上寫入的實際位元組數目。

span.span: The actual number of bytes written at the location indicated by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可以是僅適用於連續區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, can be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或應用程式的資料量大到需要分割成較小的區塊時，應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 任何大於 U + 007F 的 Unicode 字元就會轉譯成 ASCII 問號 (「？ 」)。Any Unicode character greater than U+007F is translated to an ASCII question mark ("?"). > [!CAUTION] > 基於安全性理由，您的應用程式，建議使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your application is recommended to use , , or and enable error detection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可以是僅適用於連續區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, can be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或應用程式的資料量大到需要分割成較小的區塊時，應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 任何大於 U + 007F 的 Unicode 字元編碼為 ASCII 問號 (「？ 」)。Any Unicode character greater than U+007F is encoded as the ASCII question mark ("?"). > [!CAUTION] > 基於安全性理由，您的應用程式，建議使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your application is recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用範圍的字元字串進行編碼，並將編碼的字元儲存在位元組陣列中的項目範圍的方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to encode a range of characters from a string and store the encoded characters in a range of elements in a byte array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要計算所需的精確陣列大小儲存產生的位元組，應用程式會使用。To calculate the exact array size required by to store the resulting bytes, the application uses . 若要計算的最大陣列大小，應用程式應該使用。To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use . 方法通常可讓較少的記憶體配置而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allows allocation of less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可以是僅適用於連續區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, can be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或應用程式的資料量大到需要分割成較小的區塊時，應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 任何大於 U + 007F 的 Unicode 字元編碼為 ASCII 問號 (「？ 」)。Any Unicode character greater than U+007F is encoded as the ASCII question mark ("?"). > [!CAUTION] > 基於安全性理由，您的應用程式，建議使用， ，或並啟用錯誤偵測。For security reasons, your application is recommended to use , , or and enable error detection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用編碼的 Unicode 字元陣列中的項目範圍，並將編碼的位元組儲存在位元組陣列中的項目範圍的方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to encode a range of elements from a Unicode character array and store the encoded bytes in a range of elements in a byte array. MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Text.Decoder GetDecoder ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Text.Decoder GetDecoder() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDecoder () As Decoder
public: override System::Text::Decoder ^ GetDecoder();

summary.span: 取得可以將以 ASCII 編碼的位元組序列轉換成 Unicode 字元序列的解碼器。

span.span: Obtains a decoder that converts an ASCII encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

returns.span: ，可以將以 ASCII 編碼的位元組序列轉換成 Unicode 字元序列。

span.span: A that converts an ASCII encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將序列的位元組區塊轉換成循序區塊中的字元，其方式類似這個類別的方法。The method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 不過，維護呼叫，因此它可以正確解碼位元組序列跨越區塊之間的狀態資訊。However, a maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks. 也會保留資料區塊的結尾的後隨位元組，並在下一步解碼作業中使用尾端位元組。The also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation. 因此，和進行網路傳輸，而檔案作業很實用是因為這些作業經常要處理而不是完整的資料流的資料區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Text.Encoder GetEncoder ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Text.Encoder GetEncoder() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEncoder () As Encoder
public: override System::Text::Encoder ^ GetEncoder();

summary.span: 取得可以將 Unicode 字元序列轉換成以 ASCII 編碼的位元組序列的編碼器。

span.span: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into an ASCII encoded sequence of bytes.

returns.span: ，可將 Unicode 字元序列轉換成以 ASCII 編碼的位元組序列。

span.span: An that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into an ASCII encoded sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將字元的循序區塊轉換成位元組，以類似方式循序區塊這個類別的方法。The method converts sequential blocks of characters into sequential blocks of bytes, in a manner similar to the method of this class. 不過，維護呼叫，讓它正確可以編碼跨越區塊的字元序列之間的狀態資訊。However, an maintains state information between calls so it can correctly encode character sequences that span blocks. 也保留尾端字元的資料區塊的結尾，並在下一步的編碼作業中使用尾端字元。The also preserves trailing characters at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing characters in the next encoding operation. 例如，資料區塊可能會不相符的高 surrogate，以結束，而且比對的低 surrogate 可能在下一個資料區塊中。For example, a data block might end with an unmatched high surrogate, and the matching low surrogate might be in the next data block. 因此，和進行網路傳輸，而檔案作業很實用是因為這些作業經常要處理而不是完整的資料流的資料區塊。Therefore, and are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetMaxByteCount (int charCount);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetMaxByteCount(int32 charCount) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetMaxByteCount (charCount As Integer) As Integer
public: override int GetMaxByteCount(int charCount);

param.name: charCount
param.span: 要編碼的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters to encode.

summary.span: 計算將指定數目的字元編碼所產生的最大位元組數目。

span.span: Calculates the maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

returns.span: 編碼指定字元數所產生的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會計算所需的精確陣列大小方法來儲存產生的位元組，而方法會計算最大陣列大小。The method calculates the exact array size required by the method to store the resulting bytes, whereas the method calculates the maximum array size. 方法通常會配置較少的記憶體，但是方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allocates less memory, but the method generally executes faster. 最差狀況的字，包括最壞的情況下，針對目前所選。 is a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果您選擇的取代後援是可能的大型字串、可以傳回較大的值。If you choose a replacement fallback with a potentially large string, can return large values. 方法會考量先前編碼作業從潛在剩餘的 surrogate。The method considers potential leftover surrogates from a previous encoding operation. 如此一來，如果物件會使用預設值取代後援，或以單一可能後援字元已定義自訂取代後援，如果該方法會傳回`charCount`+ 1。As a result, if the object uses the default replacement fallback, or if a custom replacement fallback has been defined with a single possible fallback character, the method returns `charCount` + 1. 如果物件使用取代後援，具有一個以上可能的後援字元，則方法會傳回*n* \* (`charCount` + 1)，其中*n*是後援的最大數目字元。If the object uses a replacement fallback with more than one possible fallback character, the method returns *n* \* (`charCount` + 1), where *n* is the maximum number of fallback characters. 有沒有關係。 has no relation to . 如果您的應用程式需要類似的函數，以搭配，應該使用。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxByteCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`。`GetMaxByteCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來計算編碼指定的字元數所需的位元組。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to calculate the bytes required to encode a specified number of characters. [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CPP/getmaxbytecount-int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/CS/getmaxbytecount-int32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxByteCount Example/VB/getmaxbytecount-int32.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 所產生的位元組數目大於可用整數傳回的數目上限。

span.span: The resulting number of bytes is greater than the maximum number that can be returned as an integer.

span.span: The number of bytes to decode.

summary.span: 計算將指定數目的位元組解碼所產生的最大字元數。

span.span: Calculates the maximum number of characters produced by decoding the specified number of bytes.

returns.span: 解碼指定位元組數所產生的最大字元數。

span.span: The maximum number of characters produced by decoding the specified number of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會計算所需的精確陣列大小字元來儲存所產生的方法，而方法會計算最大陣列大小。The method calculates the exact array size required by the method to store the resulting characters, whereas the method calculates the maximum array size. 方法通常會配置較少的記憶體，而方法通常執行速度更快。The method generally allocates less memory, while the method generally executes faster. 擷取最壞情況的數目，包括最壞的情況下，針對目前所選。 retrieves a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected . 如果後援解碼器不存在的長度上限為後援的*n*、方法會傳回*n* \* `byteCount`。If a decoder fallback is present that has a maximum fallback length of *n*, the method returns *n* \* `byteCount`. 有沒有關係。 has no relation to . 如果您的應用程式需要類似的函數，以搭配，應該使用。If your application needs a similar function to use with , it should use . > [!NOTE] > `GetMaxCharCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxCharCount(1)`。`GetMaxCharCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxCharCount(1)`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來計算解碼指定的位元組數所需字元的數目上限。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to calculate the maximum number of characters needed to decode a specified number of bytes. [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxCharCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxCharCount Example/CPP/getmaxcharcount-int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxCharCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxCharCount Example/CS/getmaxcharcount-int32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxCharCount Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetMaxCharCount Example/VB/getmaxcharcount-int32.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-

exception.span: 所產生的位元組數目大於可用整數傳回的數目上限。

span.span: The resulting number of bytes is greater than the maximum number that can be returned as an integer.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetString (byte[] bytes, int byteIndex, int byteCount);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetString(unsigned int8[] bytes, int32 byteIndex, int32 byteCount) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetString (bytes As Byte(), byteIndex As Integer, byteCount As Integer) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetString(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ bytes, int byteIndex, int byteCount);

param.name: bytes
param.span: 包含要解碼之位元組序列的位元組陣列。

span.span: The byte array containing the sequence of bytes to decode.

param.name: byteIndex
param.span: 要解碼的第一個位元組索引。

span.span: The index of the first byte to decode.

param.name: byteCount
param.span: 要解碼的位元組數。

span.span: The number of bytes to decode.

summary.span: 將位元組陣列中的某一段位元組範圍解碼成字串。

span.span: Decodes a range of bytes from a byte array into a string.

returns.span: ，包含將指定之位元組序列解碼的結果。

span.span: A containing the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要轉換，例如，從資料流讀取資料的資料可以是僅適用於連續區塊。Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, can be available only in sequential blocks. 在此情況下，或應用程式的資料量大到需要分割成較小的區塊時，應該使用或提供方法或方法，分別。In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the or the provided by the method or the method, respectively. 未提供錯誤偵測。 does not provide error detection. 任何大於 0x7F 十六進位的位元組解碼為 Unicode 問號 (「？ 」)。Any byte greater than hexadecimal 0x7F is decoded as the Unicode question mark ("?"). > [!CAUTION] > 基於安全性理由，您應該使用， ，或類別，以及啟用錯誤偵測，而不是使用類別。For security reasons, you should use the , , or classes and enable error detection instead of using the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，將轉換成位元組陣列。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to convert a byte array into a . [!code-cpp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example/CPP/getstring-byte[].cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example/CS/getstring-byte[].cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.ASCIIEncoding.GetString1 Example/VB/getstring-byte[].vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，指出目前的編碼方式是否使用單一位元組字碼指標。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the current encoding uses single-byte code points.
This property is always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是使用屬性來判斷針對編碼作業，以及針對解碼作業的字元陣列的大小的位元組陣列的大小 (例如，以便為位元組陣列的大小是\* 的字元數目編碼），您應該呼叫或針對編碼作業的方法和或針對解碼作業的方法。Instead of using the property to determine the size of a byte array for encoding operations and the size of a character array for decoding operations (for example, so that the size of the byte array is \* the number of characters to be encoded), you should call the or method for encoding operations and the or method for decoding operations. 這些方法會採用計算所需的陣列大小考量物件的取代後援策略。These methods takes the object's replacement fallback strategy into account when calculating the required array size.
